column1: Bahjoi is a Nagar Palika Parishad city in Sambhal district and division Moradabad
column3: India. Bahjoi is a headquarter of Sambhal district. Pin code of Bahjoi is 244410. .In the past years of its life it was famous for the glass factory during the british colonisation.

column1: In 2011 Bahjoi Nagar Palika Parishad had a total population of 37
Bahjoi is located at 28.393°N 78.623°E﻿ / 28.393; 78.623. It has an average elevation of 655 metres (1540 feet).
Bahjoi is well connected to Delhi
column13: via train. There is also a railway station.
